title: 2012: The Return of Quetzalcoatl
description: Includes a new afterword by the AuthorThe acclaimed metaphysical epic that binds together the cosmological phenomena of our time, ranging from crop circles to quantum theory to the resurgence of psychedelic drugs, to support the contention of the Mayan calendar that the year 2012 portends a global shift—in consciousness, culture & way of living—of unprecedented consequence.
author: Daniel Pinchbeck
